${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:MagicStrike.NAME: Magic Attack
${modID}:MagicStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Flip 3 random cards to back side.

${modID}:AlertHint.NAME: Alert Hint
${modID}:AlertHint.DESCRIPTION: NL Actual. Gain !B! Block. NL Select !M! cards to flip to front side

${modID}:FaceMask.NAME: Face Mask
${modID}:FaceMask.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Flip 3 random cards to back side.

${modID}:Feint.NAME: Feint
${modID}:Feint.DESCRIPTION: Actual. Deal !D! damage. NL Select !M! cards to flip.

${modID}:PokerFace.NAME: Poker Face
${modID}:PokerFace.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if every card in your hand is flipped to back side. NL Gain !B! Block.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You have cards with front side in your hand.

${modID}:Shuffle.NAME: Shuffle
${modID}:Shuffle.DESCRIPTION: Flip all cards in your hand.

${modID}:DeckInsight.NAME: Deck Insight
${modID}:DeckInsight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Scry !M! cards. Flip all scryed cards to front side.

${modID}:Smoke.NAME: Smoke
${modID}:Smoke.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak to all enemies. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Swap.NAME: Swap
${modID}:Swap.DESCRIPTION: Swap the energy cost of 2 cards in your hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Teleport.NAME: Teleport
${modID}:Teleport.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards and flip them to back side.

${modID}:KnockOut.NAME: Knock Out
${modID}:KnockOut.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Flip all cards in your hand to back side.

${modID}:PokerGun.NAME: Poker Gun
${modID}:PokerGun.DESCRIPTION: Discard any number of reversed cards. NL Deal !D! damage for each card discarded.

${modID}:Recapture.NAME: Recapture
${modID}:Recapture.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put !M! cards from your discard pile to your hand. Flip them to back side.

${modID}:Notice.NAME: Notice
${modID}:Notice.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Energy. NL Draw 3 cards. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Cheat.NAME: Cheat
${modID}:Cheat.DESCRIPTION: Select a back side card in your hand. NL Play it without energy cost.

${modID}:PhantomSteal.NAME: Phantom Steal
${modID}:PhantomSteal.DESCRIPTION: Exchange your draw pile with your discard pile. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:PhantomSteal.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exchange your draw pile with your discard pile.

${modID}:RepeatTrick.NAME: Repeat Trick
${modID}:RepeatTrick.DESCRIPTION: Play the last card you played again. NL Increase energy cost by 1 each time this card is played.

${modID}:GrandPrelude.NAME: Grand Prelude
${modID}:GrandPrelude.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if there are no cards in your discard pile. NL Deal 12 damage to ALL enemies.
${modID}:GrandPrelude.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if there are no cards in your discard pile. NL Deal 12 damage to ALL enemies. NL Innate.

${modID}:OmnipotentPocket.NAME: Omnipotent Pocket
${modID}:OmnipotentPocket.DESCRIPTION: Draw back side cards until your hand is full. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:OmnipotentPocket.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw back side cards until your hand is full.

${modID}:Prepare.NAME: Prepare
${modID}:Prepare.DESCRIPTION: Actual. NL Gain !B! blocks. NL Shuffle a miracle into your draw pile.
${modID}:Prepare.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! blocks. NL Shuffle a miracle+ into your draw pile.

${modID}:Sneak.NAME: Sneak
${modID}:Sneak.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! blocks. NL Retain all back side cards in your hand.

${modID}:Raid.NAME: Raid
${modID}:Raid.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this card is flipped, deal !D! damage again.

${modID}:MagicGlove.NAME: Magic Glove
${modID}:MagicGlove.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Select a card to flip.

${modID}:MysticTechniques.NAME: Mystic Techniques
${modID}:MysticTechniques.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this card is flipped, gain 2 energy.

${modID}:Cleanse.NAME: Cleanse
${modID}:Cleanse.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Clear all buffs from them. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Cleanse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Clear all debuffs from them.

${modID}:StunGun.NAME: Stun Gun
${modID}:StunGun.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Stun the enemy. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Cardistry.NAME: Cardistry
${modID}:Cardistry.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less Energy for each time this card is flipped. NL Deal !D! damage 3 times.

${modID}:MindMagic.NAME: Mind Magic
${modID}:MindMagic.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you flip a card, gain !M! Block.

${modID}:Flashbang.NAME: Flashbang
${modID}:Flashbang.DESCRIPTION: Set all hand cards to front side.
${modID}:Flashbang.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Actual. NL Set all hand cards to front side.

${modID}:HeartfeltApologies.NAME: Heartfelt Apologies
${modID}:HeartfeltApologies.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if you have no back side cards in hand. NL Deal !D! damage.

${modID}:TrickExposure.NAME: Trick Exposure
${modID}:TrickExposure.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a reversed card, flip it to front side.
${modID}:TrickExposure.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you play a reversed card, flip it to front side.

${modID}:UnparalleledSkill.NAME: Unparalleled Skill
${modID}:UnparalleledSkill.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a card, flip it to back side.

${modID}:CoverUp.NAME: Cover-Up
${modID}:CoverUp.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Intangible. NL Add 1 FakeGem to your hand.

${modID}:WhiteCloak.NAME: White Cloak
${modID}:WhiteCloak.DESCRIPTION: Actual. NL Gain !B! block. NL Choose to flip !M! cards in your hand.

${modID}:Transmitter.NAME: Transmitter
${modID}:Transmitter.DESCRIPTION: Actual. NL Mark a card in your hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:LoopholeDetection.NAME: Loophole Detection
${modID}:LoopholeDetection.DESCRIPTION: Mark the card with the highest energy cost in your hand.

${modID}:PupilOfMoon.NAME: Pupil of Moon
${modID}:PupilOfMoon.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Retain. NL Gain !M! temporary Dexterity. NL Discard when you deal damage.

${modID}:MotherOfGems.NAME: Mother of Gems
${modID}:MotherOfGems.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Retain. NL At the start of your turn, draw !M! additional card. NL Discard when you discard a card.
${modID}:MotherOfGems.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Retain. NL At the start of your turn, draw !M! additional cards. NL Discard when you discard a card.

${modID}:DarkStar.NAME: Dark Star
${modID}:DarkStar.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Retain. NL Gain !M! temporary Strength. NL Discard when you receive damage.

${modID}:BlueBirthday.NAME: Blue Birthday
${modID}:BlueBirthday.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Retain. NL At the start of your turn, gain 1 Energy. NL Discard when you play !M! cards.

${modID}:Pandora.NAME: Pandora
${modID}:Pandora.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Retain. NL At the end of your turn, heal !M! HP. NL Discard when other gems in your hand.

${modID}:BloodTears.NAME: Blood Tears
${modID}:BloodTears.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Retain. NL At the end of your turn, exhaust a card in your hand.
${modID}:BloodTears.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Retain. NL At the end of your turn, choose a card in your hand to exhaust.

${modID}:ElfLips.NAME: Elf Lips
${modID}:ElfLips.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Retain. NL Mark cards with 0 energy cost in your hand. NL Discard when you play a front side card.
${modID}:ElfLips.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Retain. NL Mark cards with 0, 2, 3 energy costs in your hand. NL Discard when you play a front side card.

${modID}:Vanish.NAME: Vanish
${modID}:Vanish.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw 2 cards and flip them to back side.

${modID}:CardTrick.NAME: Card Trick
${modID}:CardTrick.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card and flip to back. NL Discard !M! card and flip to front.

${modID}:Fish.NAME: Fish
${modID}:Fish.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. At the end of your turn, discard all gems in your hand. NL Ethereal.

${modID}:Flee.NAME: Flee
${modID}:Flee.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Shuffle a Fish into your draw pile.

${modID}:SilverBullet.NAME: Silver Bullet
${modID}:SilverBullet.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a gem in your hand. Rare deal 30 damage, otherwise deal 20 damage.
${modID}:SilverBullet.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a gem in your hand. Rare deal 40 damage, otherwise deal 30 damage.

${modID}:WonderForm.NAME: Wonder Form
${modID}:WonderForm.DESCRIPTION: When you draw a reversed card, reduce its energy cost by 1. NL Ethereal.
${modID}:WonderForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When you draw a reversed card, reduce its energy cost by 1.

${modID}:DualIdentity.NAME: Dual Identity
${modID}:DualIdentity.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this card is front, apply !M! Vulnerable. NL If this card is back, apply !M! Weak.

${modID}:Restitution.NAME: Restitution
${modID}:Restitution.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you discard a gem, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

${modID}:Steal.NAME: Steal
${modID}:Steal.DESCRIPTION: Choose a gem from your draw pile and put it into your hand. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Steal.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Choose a gem from your draw pile and put it into your hand.

${modID}:Scout.NAME: Scout
${modID}:Scout.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, choose !M! card from discard pile to retain.
${modID}:Scout.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, choose !M! cards from discard pile to retain.

${modID}:Forgery.NAME: Forgery
${modID}:Forgery.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your hand and add !M! copies of it to your hand. Copies are ethereal. Exhaust.

${modID}:Counterfeit.NAME: Counterfeit
${modID}:Counterfeit.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Copy a random card in your hand. Copy is ethereal. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:SleepGas.NAME: Sleep Gas
${modID}:SleepGas.DESCRIPTION: All enemies lose !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Skywalk.NAME: Skywalk
${modID}:Skywalk.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Plated Armor.

${modID}:TowerDiamond.NAME: Tower Diamond
${modID}:TowerDiamond.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If retained, gain !M! Strength.

${modID}:FakeGem.NAME: Fake Gem
${modID}:FakeGem.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Retain. NL At the end of your turn, gain 2 block.

${modID}:Disguise.NAME: Disguise
${modID}:Disguise.DESCRIPTION: Prevent the next time you would lose HP.
${modID}:Disguise.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Prevent the next 2 times you would lose HP.

${modID}:Boast.NAME: Boast
${modID}:Boast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this card is flipped, shuffle a FakeGem into your draw pile.

${modID}:WildShoot.NAME: Wild Shoot
${modID}:WildShoot.DESCRIPTION: Discard X random cards. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for each card discarded.
${modID}:WildShoot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard X + 1 random cards. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for each card discarded.

${modID}:MasterThief.NAME: Master Thief
${modID}:MasterThief.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add 1 random gem to your hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:ParisSunshine.NAME: Paris Sunshine
${modID}:ParisSunshine.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Retain. NL At the start of your turn, gain !M! charm.

${modID}:ArmsCarry.NAME: Arms Carry
${modID}:ArmsCarry.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain charm equal to the damage dealt.

${modID}:FansSupport.NAME: Fans Support
${modID}:FansSupport.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If charm greater than !M!, draw 1 card and gain 1 energy.

${modID}:Reason.NAME: Reason
${modID}:Reason.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 card in your deck. NL Flip all the same cards in all piles to front side.

${modID}:HatTrick.NAME: Hat Trick
${modID}:HatTrick.DESCRIPTION: If you play 3 same cards in a row, deal !D! damage to all enemies.
